arabic_text: وَمَن نُّعَمِّرۡهُ نُنَكِّسۡهُ فِي ٱلۡخَلۡقِۚ أَفَلَا يَعۡقِلُونَ
translation: Whomsoever We give a long life, We cause his strength to decline[19]. Do they not then understand?
footnotes: [19] Humans are born weak, then they reach their prime when they are young, then they grow physically and mentally weak when they are old.
